name: 2020 International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science (4th ICAFS 2020)
content:
Dear Friends and Colleagues, 
 On behalf of the Organizing Committee, it is our great pleasure to welcome you to participate the [**2020 The 4th International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science** (4th ICAFS 2020)](https://icafs.apaset.org/) to be held in Istanbul, Turkey during October 28-30, 2020\. (>>[General Information](https://icafs.apaset.org/about/)). 
 For more details please visit <https://icafs.apaset.org/> 
_**Organizers**_ 
 The conference is organized by Asia-Pacific Association of Science, Engineering and Technology in cooperation with multiple academic affiliations. 
_**Previous**_ 
[Previous ICAFS were succesfully held](https://icafs.apaset.org/2020/about/archive/) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (2019), Istanbul, Turkey (2018) and Lahore, Pakistan (2017). 
_**Topics**_ 
 It has been designed to provide an innovative and comprehensive overview of agricultural and food science. A focus will be given on: 1\. Agronomy, Agriculture and Plant Biotechnology; 2\. Animal Biotechnology, Veterinary and Livestock Science; 3\. Aquiculture, Fishery and Marine Biotechnology; 4\. Soil and Environmental Science; 5\. Food Science and Nutrition; 6\. Agriculture Sustainable, Resources & Environment; 7\. Related Engineering, Economic & Management, etc. ([\>>More topics](https://icafs.apaset.org/2020/about/#topics)) 
_**Program and Event**_ 
 The conference will last for two days, detailed [program please refer here](https://icafs.apaset.org/2020/program/). After the conference, we will organize an academic visit to local institutions. 
_**Venue**_ 
 Istanbul, historically known as Constantinople and Byzantium, is the most populous city in Turkey and the country's economic, cultural, and historic center ([\>>More about venue](https://icafs.apaset.org/2020/venue/)). 
 
 We look forward to an exciting meeting that promises great scientific debate and enjoyable interaction in Istanbul, Turkey ([\>>Register here](https://icafs.apaset.org/2020/registration/)). Please also bring this notice to the attention of any of your colleagues who may be interested in participating in the conference ([Download Flyer](http://img.apaset.org/uploads/soft/ICAFS2020%5FFlyer.pdf "Please help circulate the conference information."), [Registration Form](http://img.apaset.org/uploads/soft/ICAFS2020%5FRegistration%5FForm.doc)). 
 
 With best regards, 
 
 Organizing Committee of ICAFS 2020 
 Istanbul, Turkey 
 Website:<https://icafs.apaset.org/> 
 ICAFS Secretariat Email: icafs@apaset.org
